newsitem.title: NORWAY: Sparebankgruppen extends bid to Fokus.
newsitem.headline: Sparebankgruppen extends bid to Fokus.

text.p: Sparebankgruppen, a group of 16 Norwegian savings banks, said on Thursday it was extending a takeover bid for Fokus Bank until June 6.

The group said in a statement to the Oslo Bourse it was extending the 73 crowns per share offer by two weeks "in order for the board of Fokus to give shareholders information on the contents of the cooperation with Union Bank of Norway (UBN) ".
